name: io.github.ConnorBritain/mssql
description: MCP server for Microsoft SQL Server - schema discovery, profiling, and safe data operations

environmentVariables.description: SQL Server hostname or IP address
environmentVariables.name: SERVER_NAME

environmentVariables.description: Authentication mode: sql, windows, or aad
environmentVariables.name: SQL_AUTH_MODE

environmentVariables.description: Username for SQL or Windows auth
environmentVariables.name: SQL_USERNAME

environmentVariables.description: Password for SQL or Windows auth
environmentVariables.name: SQL_PASSWORD

environmentVariables.description: Set true to disable write operations
environmentVariables.name: READONLY
